name: Earthcore: Shattered Elements (PC, Mac & Mobile) (Canceled)
blurb: Earthcore could be to TCGs what Diablo was to the RPG genre! It's deep, dynamic, quick to play - with dramatic PvE & online PvP modes!

rewards.reward: No Reward

CASUAL BACKER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approximately \u20ac4 / \u00a33)  ============================= Thank you for your support! You get personalized \u2018Thank You\u2019 e-mail, Special Thanks credit on our website and the CASUAL BACKER badge on the Earthcore forum. You can also count on free hugs whenever you meet us.

BETA BACKER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac7 / \u00a36) ============================= \r\nIn addition to everything from the CASUAL BACKER tier, you get a selection of beautiful WALLPAPERS, in-game GOLD worth $15 and BETA ACCESS to the game. Of course, when the BETA period is over, you will be able to play the full version of the game without spending an additional penny.

THE POSTMAN ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac11 / \u00a39) ============================= \r\nIn addition to everything from the BETA BACKER tier, you get an exclusive Earthcore POSTCARD SIGNED BY THE TEAM! \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $5 for int'l shipping

CARD RAIDER \u25cf EARLY BIRD \u25cf ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac15 / \u00a312)  ============================= In addition to everything from the BETA BACKER tier, you get a digital NOVELLA set in the world of Earthcore and a digital SOUNDTRACK by Jerzy Adam Nowak (MP3/FLAC). Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $30 value, you will get a SPECIAL THANKS credit in the Backers section in-game and the SILVER BACKER forum badge. Best of all, you will receive an EXCLUSIVE CARD for use IN-GAME that will never be available from any other source!

ART LOVER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac29 / \u00a324) ============================= \r\nIn addition to everything from the BETA BACKER tier, you get 3 PRINTED ILLUSTRATIONS straight from the world of Earthcore and a beautiful POSTCARD signed by the team! Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $25. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $5 for int'l shipping

CARD RAIDER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac22 / \u00a318) ============================= In addition to everything from the BETA BACKER tier, you get a digital NOVELLA set in the world of Earthcore and a digital SOUNDTRACK by Jerzy Adam Nowak (MP3/FLAC). Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $30 value, you will get a SPECIAL THANKS credit in the Backers section in-game and the SILVER BACKER forum badge. Best of all, you will receive an EXCLUSIVE CARD for use IN-GAME that will never be available from any other source!

MAGIC FIGHTER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac29 / \u00a324) ============================= In addition to everything from the CARD RAIDER tier, you get an exclusive Earthcore POSTER, 3 DIGITAL BOOSTER PACKS for use in-game, 5 PRINTED ILLUSTRATIONS straight from the world of Earthcore and a beautiful POSTCARD signed by the team! Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $40. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

TREASURE HUNTER 
● TIME-LIMITED ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. €36 / £30) =============================
ONLY AVAILABLE FOR THE FIRST 5 DAYS SINCE LAUNCH! This reward contains all the goodies of the CARD RAIDER tier but your in-game GOLD gift is worth $150. Better yet, in addition to the Kickstarter EXCLUSIVE CARD, you also get a super limited SPECIAL CARD that is only available in this tier! This is a one-of-a-kind offer, so if you want the most bang for your buck, the TREASURE HUNTER reward is perfect for you!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
NOTE: This pledge reward will be marked as sold out after first 5 days of the campaign. Hurry up!

DECK BUILDER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac44 / \u00a336) ============================= In addition to everything from the CARD RAIDER tier, you get backer-exclusive AVATARS to use in both  single and multiplayer modes, 3 free BOOSTER PACKS to use in-game and a digital download of a wonderful AUDIO BOOK set in the world of Earthcore. Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $60.

MUSIC MASTER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac51 / \u00a342) ============================= In addition to everything from the MAGIC FIGHTER tier, you get a physical prestige edition SOUNDTRACK CD that also includes AUDIO BOOK expanding on the story. In addition, you will be granted access to Backer-exclusive AVATARS to use in both  single and multiplayer modes. Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $70. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

EARTH OBSERVER \u25cf EARLY BIRD \u25cf ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac65 / \u00a354)  ============================= In addition to everything from the DECK BUILDER tier, you get a beautiful DIGITAL ARTBOOK, GOLD DOUBLER to make your progress faster, 5 GIFT PACKS that you can send to selected friends and THANKS FROM NEAR SPACE - an absolutely revolutionary reward that will allow you to see your name among the stars. Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $120 value, you will get a SPECIAL THANKS credit in the MAIN CREDITS of the game and the GOLD BACKER forum badge.

EARTH OBSERVER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac87 / \u00a372)  ============================= In addition to everything from the DECK BUILDER tier, you get a beautiful DIGITAL ARTBOOK, GOLD DOUBLER to make your progress faster, 5 GIFT PACKS that you can send to selected friends and THANKS FROM NEAR SPACE - an absolutely revolutionary reward that will allow you to see your name among the stars. Your free in-game GOLD amount will also be upgraded to $120 value, you will get a SPECIAL THANKS credit in the MAIN CREDITS of the game and the GOLD BACKER forum badge.

EARTHCORE ENTHUSIAST ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac102 / \u00a384)  ============================= In addition to everything from the EARTH OBSERVER tier, you get an invitation to a BI-WEEKLY DESIGN CHAT with our team and exclusive access to EARTHCORE: ORIGINS in April! Earthcore: Origins is a fully playable prequel to Shattered Elements that allows you to undertake several single-player missions with a pre-defined deck and familiarize yourself with the gameplay. You will also get a TEAM SUPPORTER credit in the MAIN CREDITS as well as not just one but 3 BACKER-EXCLUSIVE CARDS in-game.

GOODIE GATHERER \u25cf EARLY BIRD \u25cf ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac182 / \u00a3150)  ============================= You get everything from the EARTHCORE ENTHUSIAST tier but your NOVELLA and ARTBOOK are beautifully printed, your soundtrack comes on a prestige edition CD and you get a limited edition POSTER. We will also send you a thank you POSTCARD personally signed by key members of our team. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

GOODIE GATHERER  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac218/ \u00a3180) ============================= You get everything from the EARTHCORE ENTHUSIAST tier but your NOVELLA and ARTBOOK are beautifully printed, your soundtrack comes on a prestige edition CD and you get a limited edition POSTER. We will also send you a thank you POSTCARD personally signed by key members of our team. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

SLICK STRATEGIST  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DIGITAL (Approx. \u20ac363 / \u00a3300)  ============================= In addition to everything from the EARTHCORE ENTHUSIAST tier, you get a digital, print-ready copy of the POSTER, early access to a BONUS CHAPTER in the single-player campaign featuring lots of unique cards as well as a version of the DECK PLANNER software that we use in development. This little tool will allow you to browse through all the cards available in the game and simulate battles between decks of your creation. You will also get an AMBASSADOR badge for use on the official forum as well as 10 BOOSTER PACKS instead of just 5.

ELEMENTAL BEARER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac495 / \u00a3408) ============================= In addition to all the physical rewards of the GOODIE GATHERER tier and the digital perks of SLICK STRATEGIST, you get a limited edition, backer-exclusive T-SHIRT that won\u2019t be available from any other venue and Earthcore: Origins BOARD GAME that will allow you to duel your friends with exquisitely printed physical cards. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

CRAFTY CARTOGRAPHER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac582 / \u00a3480) ============================= In addition to all the rewards of the ELEMENTAL BEARER tier, you get to NAME A CARD, receive a very limited edition CLOTH MAP of the world of Earthcore and we will grant you EARLY ACCESS to ALL FUTURE TEQUILA GAMES! Your PRINTED ARTBOOK will also be SIGNED by key members of the team and you will get 100.00 worth of BOOSTER PACKS as well as a DESIGN CONSULTANT credit and 5 BACKER-EXCLUSIVE CARDS in-game instead of just 3. At this tier, we will also make sure to set you up with MONTHLY IN-GAME GOODIES for A YEAR, including FREE GOLD and BOOSTER PACKS. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

GUEST DESIGNER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac727 / \u00a3600)  ============================= In addition to all the rewards of the CRAFTY CARTOGRAPHER tier, you get to work with our team and CREATE A CARD by coming up with the concept behind it. You will also have an intimate chat with our CEO and LEAD DESIGNER on SKYPE and receive a limited edition COVER FOR YOUR iOS DEVICE. We will also send you a print of the card that you\u2019ve created and your ARTBOOK will be offered in exclusive OVERSIZED EDITION. Your in-game credit becomes GUEST DESIGNER, you get $200 worth of BOOSTER PACKS and your forum badge gets upgraded to the EARTHCORE ANGEL level. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping

GUEST ARTIST ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac1818 / \u00a31499) ============================= In addition to all the rewards of the GUEST DESIGNER tier, you get to DRAW A CARD. Plus, we will mail you a print of your card, stylishly framed. Your in-game credit will be upgraded to a respectful GUEST ARTIST and you get a GOLDEN ANGEL badge to use on our forum. Finally, you'll have a chance to MEET US AT GAMESCOM in Cologne later this year at a press day (closed to public) + a follow up GAMES PARTY in the evening. What's more, our lead artists will create an exclusive Earthcore-theme TATOO DESIGN exclusively for you!  \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping \u25cf Cost of travel to Cologne not included.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac3635 / \u00a32997) ============================= In addition to all the rewards of the GUEST ARTIST tier, you get to BECOME A CARD. That\u2019s right, you will be featured in the game as one of Earthcore\u2019s valiant heroes or terrifying villains! We will also create a selectable avatar in your likeness and provide you with a custom iPad with the game preloaded. Your credit will be upgraded to a prestigious ASSOCIATE PRODUCER and you get a CRYSTAL ANGEL badge to use on our forum. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping \u25cf Cost of travel to Cologne not included.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PHYSICAL (Approx. \u20ac7270 / \u00a36000)   ============================= In addition to all the rewards of the ASSOCIATE PRODUCER tier, you get to BECOME A BOSS. A character based on you will be a major enemy found in the storyline and every player will be forced to face you! We will also invite you and your buddy to meet us in our headquarters in Wroclaw, Poland. We will show you how we work and take you on an adventure-filled tour of the city. Your credit will be upgraded to \u00fcber-exclusive EXECUTIVE PRODUCER and we will design a CUSTOM BADGE of your choosing to use on our forum. \u25cf If you live outside the US, EU, UK or CA, please add $20 for int'l shipping \u25cf Cost of travel to Cologne and/or Wroclaw not included.
